note.p: Birth: Catterall, near Churchtown, Lancashire, England (18 January 1825)
Buried at Reigate Churchyard on 22 August 1899
Career: Professor of Chemistry, Owen's College, Manchester (to 1857)
References: Sir Brian Pippard, FRS, 'Schoolmaster-Fellows and the campaign for science education' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 63-81, plate
John Hedley Brooke, review of Colin A Russell, Lancastrian Chemist: the Early Years of Sir Edward Frankland in NR 1990 vol 44 pp 135-136
Roy M MacLeod, 'The X-Club: A Social Network of Science in Late-Victorian England' in NR 1969 vol 24 pp 305-322
